title: Bloomberg Markets: Halen Takes Underground Culinary Tour
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Halen Takes Underground Culinary Tour
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Michael Halen Company Analyst Bloomberg Intelligence Discussingtaking part in the Underground Culinary Tour, visited 15 of the most innovative and exciting restaurants, food halls, wineries, etc. in NYC to view the latest and greatest trends in the restaurant industry.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
